languages.text: "Я обещаю — ксеносы дорого расплатятся за каждую человеческую жизнь, что забрали!"
"I vow to make the xenos pay dearly for every human life they've claimed!"
languages.original_text: "Я обещаю — ксеносы дорого расплатятся за каждую человеческую жизнь, что забрали!"

traits.locale_text: "I vow to make the xenos pay dearly for every human life they've claimed!"
"I vow to make the xenos pay dearly for every human life they've claimed!"
"I vow to make the xenos pay dearly for every human life they've claimed!"
"I vow to make the xenos pay dearly for every human life they've claimed!"
"I vow to make the xenos pay dearly for every human life they've claimed!"

languages.text: 「異種族が奪ったすべての人命の代償を奴らに払わせることを誓う！」
languages.original_text: "I vow to make the xenos pay dearly for every human life they've claimed!"

traits.locale_text: 「異種族が奪ったすべての人命の代償を奴らに払わせることを誓う！」

languages.text: “我发誓，那些异形要为他们夺走的每一条性命付出惨痛的代价！”
languages.original_text: "I vow to make the xenos pay dearly for every human life they've claimed!"

traits.locale_text: “我发誓，那些异形要为他们夺走的每一条性命付出惨痛的代价！”

languages.text: «¡Juro que los xenos pagarán caro cada vida humana que se han cobrado!».
languages.original_text: "I vow to make the xenos pay dearly for every human life they've claimed!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Juro que los xenos pagarán caro cada vida humana que se han cobrado!».

languages.text: « J'en fais le serment : les xénos paieront pour chaque vie humaine qu'ils ont ôtée ! »
languages.original_text: "I vow to make the xenos pay dearly for every human life they've claimed!"

traits.locale_text: « J'en fais le serment : les xénos paieront pour chaque vie humaine qu'ils ont ôtée ! »

languages.text: "Ich schwöre, die Xenos werden für jedes Menschenleben, das sie genommen haben, teuer bezahlen!"
languages.original_text: "I vow to make the xenos pay dearly for every human life they've claimed!"

traits.locale_text: "Ich schwöre, die Xenos werden für jedes Menschenleben, das sie genommen haben, teuer bezahlen!"

languages.text: "Yemin olsun, canını aldıkları her insan için zenolardan hesap soracağım!"
languages.original_text: "I vow to make the xenos pay dearly for every human life they've claimed!"

traits.locale_text: "Yemin olsun, zenoların canını aldığı her insan için onlardan hesap soracağım!"
